attributes.action: recognise Jedi Knights as a religion on par with Christianity, Islam and other beliefs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The belief of Jedi Knights in 'the Force' is no more irrational than any other religious belief - but with less bigotry.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "recognise Jedi Knights as a religion on par with Christianity, Islam and other beliefs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11053.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/JediKnights/
